Header.title: Traverse
Header.paragraph: A virtual tourism platform is an online platform that allows users to virtually explore tourist destinations in the city of MARRAKECH.

About.paragraph: We are a team of four people and also students in the Network and Information Systems Engineering sector at the Faculty of Science and Technology of Marrakech. As part of a module, entitled 'Project Management' of the IRISI training, we created a similation company ExploTech in order to carry out a TraVerse project, of which we opted to include the garden in this project.

Services.name: Virtual reality
Services.text: Our platform features 360-degree viewing and virtual navigation, providing an immersive and realistic experience.

Services.name: 3D objects
Services.text: Our project offers an interactive and relevant experience by allowing the visualization of 3D objects accompanied by written and audio information.

Services.name: Other features
Services.text: Set up a cultural quiz to acquire knowledge. Set up a virtual museum to visualize 3D objects.

Features.title: Tourist and cultural interest
Features.text: Preservation of heritage. Promotion of tourism. Prepare a trip. Understand the cultural historical context of the places

Features.title: Interest for architects
Features.text: Architects can study places in detail from all angles.

Features.title: Technological interest
Features.text: Take advantage of new technologies, such as virtual and augmented reality, to create an even more immersive and interactive visit experience.

Features.title: Interactive learning
Features.text: Our platform offers an interactive experience that allows users to learn while having fun with a virtual quiz.
